author: Pursuit of Wonder
description:
Go to this link https://boot.dev/?promo=WONDER and use my code WONDER to get 25% off your first payment for boot.dev. Thank you to boot.dev for sponsoring this video.

In this video, we follow a short story of a couple debating what seems to be an inexplicable event. When the two disagree over what occurred, they work through various strategies of debate and understanding, attempting to cut through the uncertainty and find the truth. One set of strategies–philosophical razors—seems to clearly be the sharpest.

title: Philosophical Razors: Powerful Ways to Win Almost Any Argument
